description: Weekly laboratory classes assessed through prelab quizzes, lab notebooks, experimental write-ups, and a lab test. Includes safety, record-keeping, and interpretation of results.
Closed-book exam covering syllabus material (excluding first 9 lectures). Combines multi-choice and written-answer questions during the formal examination period.
Test focusing on first 9 lectures with multi-choice and written-answer questions. Feedback provided during teaching period.
Three take-home assignments covering course topics (3% each). Short-answer questions designed to prepare for exams, returned with annotated feedback.
